login.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Woodwork, your go-to app for managing woodworking projects and materials.
login.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
login.failed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

register.acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions
register.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign In

lumber.title: Lumber Inventory
lumber.subtitle: Manage your lumber types, pricing, and characteristics
lumber.emptySubtitle: Get started by adding your first lumber type to track pricing, hardness ratings, and recommended uses
lumber.name: Name
lumber.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this lumber? This action will mark it as deleted but can be restored later.

finishes.title: Wood Finishes
finishes.subtitle: Manage your wood finish products, pricing, and recommendations
finishes.emptySubtitle: Get started by adding your first wood finish to track products, pricing, and use cases
finishes.name: Name
finishes.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this finish? This action will mark it as deleted but can be restored later.

tools.title: Tool Inventory
tools.subtitle: Manage your tools, track purchases, and organize your workshop
tools.emptySubtitle: Get started by adding your first tool to track your workshop equipment, serial numbers, and pricing
tools.name: Name
tools.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this tool? This action will mark it as deleted but can be restored later.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Plan and estimate your woodworking projects with material and cost calculations
projects.emptySubtitle: Get started by creating your first project to calculate materials, costs, and plan your woodworking

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your preferences and application settings
settings.saveMessage: Settings are automatically saved and will persist across sessions.
